page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE PART 2
page.content: When the bell goes we go into class, write our spellings and do mathematics until playtime. In the 15 minute playtime I eat my apple and play football. After playtime we will either do Swimming, English, Story Book or finish off what ever we were doing before play. At 12 o'clock we eat our lunch . The hall is set out with chairs and tables .When we have finished our lunch we stack the chairs into piles of ten. Next we go out to play or we have Recorders, Guitar or Rounders Practice. After play we might carry on with our Project or have a game of Rounders. At the end of school we put our chairs up on our desks and very often we have a letter to take home. After school we can go to Gym, Drama or Swimming but I usually go to William's and play on his Juno 6O and mess around with the stream.
